short_summary: Temporary paramedic services in Manitoba and Ontario
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by July 12 at 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC), on behalf of Indigenous Services Canada (ISC) has a requirement for Contractor(s) to provide temporary paramedic services to supplement its workforce in delivering primary and public health services in the provinces of Manitoba and Ontario.
duration_in_months: It was mentioned that the expected end date is one year and three months after the inital start date.The calculated months for this scenario are 23
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

**Title:** Paramedic Services
**Reference Number:** WS3448825365-Doc3865373834
**Solicitation Number:** WS3448825365
**Tender Status:** Expired
**UNSPSC Codes:** 85000000, 85121500

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Indigenous Services (ISC) invites contractors to submit proposal bids for temporarily providing paramedic services to supplement its workforce in delivering primary and public health services in the provinces of Manitoba and Ontario.

**Key Details:**

*   Tender Closing Date: July 12, 2023, at 14:00 EST
*   Expected Contract Start Date: October 1, 2023
*   Expected Contract End Date: September 30, 2025
*   Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Scope of Work:**

*   Temporary paramedic services to support the delivery of primary and public health services
*   Services will be required in the provinces of Manitoba and Ontario

**Submission Requirements:**

*   All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by the tender closing date
*   Late submissions will be declared non-responsive

**Contact Information:**

*   Contact Person: Sheldon Talsma (SPAC/PSPC)
*   Email: [sheldon.talsma@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sheldon.talsma@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice URL:** [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15383314?extsite=MTUzODMzMTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15383314?extsite=MTUzODMzMTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
